SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into statistics_union_sale (assist_order_num, assist_sale_num, assist_sale_amount, assist_help_price, assist_self_help_price, poor_order_num, poor_sale_num, poor_sale_amount, poor_self_help_price, syzx_online_order_num, syzx_online_sale_num, syzx_online_sale_amount, syzx_online_help_price, syzx_online_self_help_price, syzx_offline_order_num, syzx_offline_sale_num, syzx_offline_sale_amount, syzx_offline_help_price, syzx_offline_self_help_price, c_time, union_id, union_name, area_id, area_name, channel ) values
(#{item.assistOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.assistSaleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.assistSaleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.assistHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.assistSelfHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.poorOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.poorSaleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.poorSaleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.poorSelfHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOnlineOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.syzxOnlineSaleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.syzxOnlineSaleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOnlineHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOnlineSelfHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOfflineOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.syzxOfflineSaleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.syzxOfflineSaleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOfflineHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.syzxOfflineSelfHelpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select SUM(assist_order_num) AS assistOrderNum,SUM(assist_sale_num) AS assistSaleNum,SUM(assist_sale_amount) AS assistSaleAmount,SUM(assist_help_price) AS assistHelpPrice,SUM(assist_self_help_price) AS assistSelfHelpPrice, SUM(poor_order_num) AS poorOrderNum,SUM(poor_sale_num) AS poorSaleNum,SUM(poor_sale_amount) AS poorSaleAmount,SUM(poor_self_help_price) AS poorSelfHelpPrice, SUM(syzx_online_order_num) AS syzxOnlineOrderNum,SUM(syzx_online_sale_num) AS syzxOnlineSaleNum,SUM(syzx_online_sale_amount) AS syzxOnlineSaleAmount,SUM(syzx_online_help_price) AS syzxOnlineHelpPrice,SUM(syzx_online_self_help_price) AS syzxOnlineSelfHelpPrice, SUM(syzx_offline_order_num) AS syzxOfflineOrderNum,SUM(syzx_offline_sale_num) AS syzxOfflineSaleNum,SUM(syzx_offline_sale_amount) AS syzxOfflineSaleAmount,SUM(syzx_offline_help_price) AS syzxOfflineHelpPrice,SUM(syzx_offline_self_help_price) AS syzxOfflineSelfHelpPrice from statistics_union_sale
order by ${orderByClause}
